ComicInfo.Title: In the Belly of the Beast
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Elementals continue their battle with The Rapture in the Rocky Mountains. It starts to look like The Elementals will have the upper hand, until The Rapture get smart and use their powers against those members they will be most effective against.
Jeremy Skaggs's secret regarding the origin of The Rapture is leaked out to the press by his former assistant Dawn Moore. He holds a press conference and attempts to cover things up. Meanwhile, F.I.S.H. has decided its time to close in on the reverend.
In Philadelphia, Captain Cadaver is still loose and racking up the body count.
